subject: 🚨 You’re Invited: Token2049 - 10x Research Premium Get-Together 🚨
body:
10x Research 'Get Together' Token2049 Singapore · Luma: (https://lu.ma/jok2gjxw)

We’re hosting a private in-person event exclusively for **premium 10x Research subscribers**, taking place **just one day before Token2049 kicks off**. This is your chance to finally connect face-to-face with the sharpest traders in our community—names you already know from the 10x Telegram groups.

Expect high-quality conversations, idea-sharing, and real networking with serious market participants. This is not just another social hour—it’s where real opportunities start.

🎟️ **Don’t miss this. RSVP now to secure your spot (**[**here**](https://lu.ma/jok2gjxw)**).**
And if you haven’t registered for Token2049 yet, use our [**10% discount link below**](https://sg2025.token2049.com/?promo=10XRESEARCH10). But whether you attend the main conference or not, make sure you’re at our event—it’s the one you’ll remember.

View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/a01bd619-d536-4aba-8407-184153a54ca6/image.png?t=1753355050)
Follow image link: (https://lu.ma/jok2gjxw)
Caption: 

Join us at Token2049 for another **10x Research’s exclusive side event**—your prime opportunity to network with fellow traders!

**Get your Token2049 conference tickets with an extra 10% off **

Token2049 Singapore is set to sell out again—secure your ticket now to avoid disappointment and lock in huge savings. Until Friday, July 18, you can save US$600 (60%) on 1–2 October passes—and stack an extra 10% off with our exclusive code **10XRESEARCH10**. After July 18, prices go up, but you’ll still enjoy the 10% discount when you book through our link or use our promo code (**10XRESEARCH10)**. Don’t miss the biggest crypto festival of the year—grab your ticket today:

[https://sg2025.token2049.com/?promo=10XRESEARCH10](https://sg2025.token2049.com/?promo=10XRESEARCH10)

View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/48ee5528-d833-41bc-88d1-885cde6232dd/image.png?t=1753355563)
